name: n8n-nodes-base.mySqlTool
semantic_context: Get, add and update data in MySQL

descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Get, add and update data in MySQL
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

operation.name: operation

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete an entire table or rows in a table

options.name: Execute SQL
options.description: Execute an SQL query

options.name: Insert
options.description: Insert rows in a table

options.name: Insert or Update
options.description: Insert or update rows in a table
options.action: Insert or update rows in a table

options.name: Select
options.description: Select rows from a table

options.name: Update
options.description: Update rows in a table

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

table.name: table
table.description: The table you want to work on
table.ai_hint: The table you want to work on

deleteCommand.name: deleteCommand

options.name: Truncate
options.description: Only removes the table's data and preserves the table's structure

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete the rows that match the 'Select Rows' conditions below. If no selection is made, all rows in the table are deleted.

options.name: Drop
options.description: Deletes the table's data and also the table's structure permanently

deleteCommand.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

where.name: where
where.description: If not set, all rows will be selected

values.name: column
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: condition
values.description: The operator to check the column against. When using 'LIKE' operator percent sign ( %) matches zero or more characters, underscore ( _ ) matches any single character.

where.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

combineConditions.name: combineConditions
combineConditions.description: How to combine the conditions defined in "Select Rows": AND requires all conditions to be true, OR requires at least one condition to be true

options.name: AND
options.description: Only rows that meet all the conditions are selected

options.name: OR
options.description: Rows that meet at least one condition are selected

combineConditions.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

options.name: options
connectionTimeoutMillis
options.description: Number of milliseconds reserved for connecting to the database

options.name: connectionLimit
options.description: Maximum amount of connections to the database, setting high value can lead to performance issues and potential database crashes

options.name: queryBatching
options.description: The way queries should be sent to the database

options.name: Single Query
options.description: A single query for all incoming items

options.name: Independent
options.description: Execute one query per incoming item of the run

options.name: Transaction
options.description: Execute all queries in a transaction, if a failure occurs, all changes are rolled back

options.name: queryReplacement
options.description: Comma-separated list of the values you want to use as query parameters. You can drag the values from the input panel on the left. More info
options.hint: Comma-separated list of values: reference them in your query as $1, $2, $3…

options.name: outputColumns
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

options.name: largeNumbersOutput
Text
options.description: Use this if you expect numbers longer than 16 digits (otherwise numbers may be incorrect)

options.hint: Applies to NUMERIC and BIGINT columns only

options.name: decimalNumbers
options.description: Whether to output DECIMAL types as numbers instead of strings

options.name: priority
Low Prioirity
options.description: Delays execution of the INSERT until no other clients are reading from the table

options.name: High Priority
options.description: Overrides the effect of the --low-priority-updates option if the server was started with that option. It also causes concurrent inserts not to be used.
Ignore any ignorable errors that occur while executing the INSERT statement

options.name: replaceEmptyStrings
options.description: Whether to replace empty strings with NULL in input, could be useful when data come from spreadsheet

options.name: selectDistinct
options.description: Whether to remove these duplicate rows

options.name: detailedOutput
options.description: Whether to show in output details of the ofexecuted query for each statement, or just confirmation of success

options.name: skipOnConflict
options.description: Whether to skip the row and do not throw error if a unique constraint or exclusion constraint is violated

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

query.name: query
query.placeholder: e.g. SELECT id, name FROM product WHERE id < 40
query.description: The SQL query to execute. You can use n8n expressions and $1, $2, $3, etc to refer to the 'Query Parameters' set in options below.
query.hint: Consider using query parameters to prevent SQL injection attacks. Add them in the options below
query.ai_hint: The SQL query to execute. You can use n8n expressions and $1, $2, $3, etc to refer to the 'Query Parameters' set in options below.

dataMode.name: dataMode

options.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
options.description: Use when node input properties names exactly match the table column names

options.name: Map Each Column Below
options.description: Set the value for each destination column manually

dataMode.description: Whether to map node input properties and the table data automatically or manually
dataMode.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

notice.displayName: In this mode, make sure incoming data fields are named the same as the columns in your table. If needed, use an 'Edit Fields' node before this node to change the field names.
notice.name: notice

valuesToSend.name: valuesToSend

values.name: column
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

valuesToSend.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

sort.name: sort

values.name: column
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

sort.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

columnToMatchOn.name: columnToMatchOn
columnToMatchOn.description: The column to compare when finding the rows to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
columnToMatchOn.hint: Used to find the correct row to update. Doesn't get changed. Has to be unique.
columnToMatchOn.ai_hint: The column to compare when finding the rows to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

valueToMatchOn.displayName: Value of Column to Match On
valueToMatchOn.name: valueToMatchOn
valueToMatchOn.description: Rows with a value in the specified "Column to Match On" that corresponds to the value in this field will be updated. New rows will be created for non-matching items.
valueToMatchOn.ai_hint: Rows with a value in the specified "Column to Match On" that corresponds to the value in this field will be updated. New rows will be created for non-matching items.

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'database' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'executeQuery' THEN HIDE parameter 'table'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'deleteTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'deleteCommand'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'deleteCommand'
IF deleteCommand == 'delete' AND resource == 'database' AND operation == 'deleteTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'where'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'where'
IF condition IN ["IS NULL", "IS NOT NULL"] THEN HIDE parameter 'value'
IF deleteCommand == 'delete' AND resource == 'database' AND operation == 'deleteTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'combineConditions'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'combineConditions'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'deleteTable' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'options'
IF /operation == 'executeQuery' THEN SHOW parameter 'queryReplacement'
IF /operation == 'select' THEN SHOW parameter 'outputColumns'
IF /operation IN ["select", "executeQuery"] THEN SHOW parameter 'largeNumbersOutput'
IF /operation IN ["select", "executeQuery"] THEN SHOW parameter 'decimalNumbers'
IF /operation == 'insert' THEN SHOW parameter 'priority'
IF /operation IN ["insert", "update", "upsert", "executeQuery"] THEN SHOW parameter 'replaceEmptyStrings'
IF /operation == 'select' THEN SHOW parameter 'selectDistinct'
IF /operation == 'insert' THEN SHOW parameter 'skipOnConflict'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'executeQuery' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'executeQuery' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'insert' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataMode'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'dataMode'
IF dataMode == 'autoMapInputData' AND resource == 'database' AND operation == 'insert' THEN SHOW parameter 'notice'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'notice'
IF dataMode == 'defineBelow' AND resource == 'database' AND operation == 'insert' THEN SHOW parameter 'valuesToSend'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'valuesToSend'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'insert' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'select' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'database' AND operation == 'select' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'select' THEN SHOW parameter 'where'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'select' THEN SHOW parameter 'combineConditions'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'select' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'sort'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'select' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataMode'
IF dataMode == 'autoMapInputData' AND resource == 'database' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'notice'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnToMatchOn'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'columnToMatchOn'
IF dataMode == 'defineBelow' AND resource == 'database' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'valueToMatchOn'
IF table == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'valueToMatchOn'
IF dataMode == 'defineBelow' AND resource == 'database' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'valuesToSend'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataMode'
IF dataMode == 'autoMapInputData' AND resource == 'database' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'notice'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnToMatchOn'
IF dataMode == 'defineBelow' AND resource == 'database' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'valueToMatchOn'
IF dataMode == 'defineBelow' AND resource == 'database' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'valuesToSend'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
